body.name: Bruno Marc Men's Mesh Oxfords Sneakers Casual Dress Lace-Up Lightweight Walking Shoes 2.0
features: Breathable Design: These men's Oxfords feature a stretchy knit upper that allows your feet to move freely. Say goodbye to stuffiness with these men's shoes.
Effortless On/Off: Designed with a stretchy collar and pull tab which makes putting on and removing these Oxford shoes hassle-free.
Cushioned Comfort: Enjoy extra support with a subtle arch design, and the cushy EVA midsole ensures your feet are supported with comfort that feels like walking on clouds.
Lightweight & Grippy: The MD outsole keeps you agile, while the rubber texture makes sure you have a solid grip with every step.
Everyday Style: From casual cool to dressed-up smart these men's shoes are your go-to for any occasion. Whether it's a casual day out or a semi-formal affair, you're covered.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these because I was looking for a shoe to wear while doing walking and light workouts. What I didn't expect was that it's one of the more stylish looking shoes I own!The fit was pretty good and the insole is great, but there are a couple drawbacks that make it not quite a "walking shoe" to me. First, it doesn't have very functional laces, and the shoe seems to rely more on its stretchy material than laces to tighten. In fact, I tied them once and now I use them as slip-on loafers. As such, it's not the strongest fit, and my heel tends to lift out of it fairly easily while moving. I still find them comfortable enough to walk in, but after a mile or two, they don't hold up as well as my similar Sketchers loafers. They're also slightly tight around the toes, but didn't cause any blisters or other nastiness.So I'd recommend them as a nice casual shoe to wear with jeans, but you might want to look for something more supportive if you intend to do a lot of activities in them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Sizing of this shoe is accurate based on my size 10.5. My feet are medium width and I find the width of this shoe to be good for me.These have the look of dress shoes, sort of, but certainly are not. The laces are mostly for show. If untied you can’t separate the left and right sides very much so pulling the laces tight does not tighten up the fit. It’s an elastic fit that pulls the shoe tight to your feet. These are slip-ons. Just leave the laces laced.You don’t need the pull tab to pull the shoe on, but it would make it more convenient/easier. However, I can’t fit my index finger into it and I think my fingers are on the thin side. I could grab it with index and thumb but that’s not near as easy as putting the index finger into the loop. So I put my finger inside the shoe and pull (stretch) it back so it goes over the heel.I find the shoe comfortable. It is light weight, which can be good, but I don’t know about durability. There is not a lot of support since it’s stretchy and light so it may not be good to use in some situations like walking through a woods.I like the look of this fancy casual shoe. It’s comfortable at a good price. 4 stars since the pull tab is not usable for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars so comfortable, great fit
reviews.reviewText: This is my first pair of Bruno Marc shoes, and I am very impressed. I ordered size 8 my regular size and they fit like a glove, not too tight or too loose but very comfortable fit. I love the toe is like a classic wingtip, but these shoes feel like comfy sneakers but look good enough for dress wear. I can wear these shoes with jeans or khakis for work or an evening out. These are very versatile shoes. I love the heel is enforced with the same material as the toes for a secure fit and comfort while walking. The sole is solid, and the insole is curved to my foot with only 4 eyelets for laces which I love. These are so well-made but also so light with the mesh sides to allow your foot to breathe. These are fantastic shoe so stylish, light and so comfortable. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not Wearable For Me
reviews.reviewText: PROS:Inexpensive for shoes in 2024.The inside sole is nicely padded.Very good looking "dress" sneaker.CONS:No tongue so basically a slip on.Shoelaces are just for looks. They do not tighten the shoe.Shoe doesn't stay on. Lifts up at heel on every step even when simply walking.No pad around the ankle.This shoe is for looks only, not for actually wearing.Not recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable and stylish!
reviews.reviewText: I've purchased Bruno Marc shoes before but these are hands down my favorites. They are one of the most versatile shoes that I have. They look great with khakis for business casual and even better with jeans. They feel like sneakers despite having a classic wingtip appearance. The sole is thick enough to provide support but these shoes are amazingly lightweight. I ordered my normal size and they fit perfectly so they are true to size. So far, really happy with these stylish and comfortable shoes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight Walking Shoes!
reviews.reviewText: I recently got these Bruno Marc Men's Mesh Oxfords Sneakers and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. The lightweight design and comfortable fit make them a great choice for casual walks or even dressing up for a night out. The mesh material allows for breathability, ensuring my feet stay cool and comfortable throughout the day. The lace-up feature provides a secure fit, and the overall style is modern and trendy. I highly recommend these shoes for anyone looking for a versatile and stylish option that doesn't compromise on comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A nice casual shoe
reviews.reviewText: These Bruno Marc Men's Mesh Oxfords Sneakers are a very nice and comfortable sneaker. The title implies that they would work for "dress up", but I'm not sure I agree with that.Regardless, they are soft and comfortable. The stretchy material makes them easy to get on, but that probably sacrifices some lateral support. The laces are, to me, for show only. The shoe doesn't have a "split" that the laces would pull together, they simply scrunch up the elastic material a bit. Certainly, they add to the look, but not so much as to the fit.Size was as expected and they fit well. I've worn them for two days now and the level of comfort has remained consistent.A good buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable shoes! It is better quality than expected, the leather is nice and the rest of the material makes the shoe very stylish, very good driving shoe or for everyday wear
